description.value:
Wondrous Item, Rare
This mask is made from a transparent, rubbery gel-like substance. When you don the mask, your face is enclosed inside a bubble of air that allows you to breathe normally for 1 hour, whether underwater or in the presence of poisonous gases or the like. This item can only be used once.
